description:
Photographer Madoka Koya is assigned to work a Super GT event, but as he wanders through the support race paddock, his curiosity is piqued by the sheer variety of teams and drivers on display in the world of Formula 4.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hashiru Otoko: I Don`t Need to Be Cheered On.
走る男 -I don`t need to be cheered on.-
